content:
I've been working cone programming proofs from this source: https://ti.inf.ethz.ch/ew/lehre/ApproxSDP09/notes/conelp.pdf
So far I've the proof of cone version of Farkas' lemma (2.3.6 Lemma from the notes) in cone/proper.lean in the PR without any sorrys.

For this, I need to create a new structure proper_cone = nonempty, closed, convex cones.
And also, this needs a new file as I need to import analysis.inner_product_space.adjoint which cannot be imported in analysis/convex/cone.lean because of cyclic imports.

I plan to break #16266 into a few smaller PRs and clean up the proofs and docstrings gradually. I just want to open this RFC PR for any comments or suggestions about how to properly add this to the library. Thanks,
